thread.title: Mark E Bronner
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Mark E Bronner

author: Mark E Bronner
title: Mark E Bronner
text: The seven of us experienced an amazing trip over the 2016 Christmas holiday. And Shay showed us the way. Everything was first class. The shuttles were spacious and on-time. The hotels were drop-dead gorgeous. The drivers spoke fluent English (and Spanish!). We rappelled down waterfalls on Christmas day, zip-lined over the rain forest, and relaxed at a beautiful Pacific beach. Sadly, we're back in Wisconsin waiting for our 7 day summer. We spent 30 minutes planning this trip and let Shay take us the rest of the way. And like UPS, she delivered.
